branchCategory.name: Electronic Switches
branchCategory.description: <p>Pneumatic switches with electronic pressure detection that provide a signal output when a setpoint is reached.</p>

branchItem.name: PS1000, Compact Electronic Pressure Switch with Fitting Plug, LED Indicator
branchItem.description: <p>PS1000 is a compact pressure switch providing a digital output signal.  The switch is set with a trimmer rotating through a 220 of range using a precision screwdriver.  A red LED lights up when the output signal is ON.  Insert the switch port into a one touch fitting to monitor pressure.  The PS1000 monitors positive pressure, with the signal ON when pressure is above the set point.  The PS1000 can measure the pressure of any non-corrosive, non-flammable gas.  PS1000 is RoHS and optionally CE compliant, with an IP40 enclosure.</p>

branchItem.name: ISE1, Pressure Switch, 1 or 2 Outputs with Analog, LED Indicator
branchItem.description: <p>ISE1 is a basic pressure switch with digital output and optional analog voltage output.  The ISE1 monitors the pressure of any non-corrosive, non-flammable gas.  Low and high pressure ranges are offered, as well as metric or NPTF male thread connections.  Rotary trimmers adjust the switch set point and variable hysteresis if 1 output, or two set point trimmers if 2 output.  A red/green LED indicator also lights when the output signal is ON.  Electrical connections include a 3 wire grommet cable or 4 wire snap-in connector.  ISE1 is CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP40 enclosure rating.</p>

branchItem.name: ISE2, Pressure Switch, 1 Output, LED Indicator
branchItem.description: <p>ISE2 is a basic pressure switch with 1 digital output (NPN or PNP).  No analog output is included.  The ISE2 monitors the pressure of any non-corrosive, non-flammable gas.  Low and high pressure ranges are offered, as well as metric or NPTF male thread connections.  A rotary trimmer adjusts the switch set point.  A red LED indicator also lights to correspond with the output signal.  Electrical connections include a 3 wire grommet cable or 3 wire snap-in connector.  ISE2 is CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP40 enclosure rating.</p>
